channel.title: bootcamp on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in bootcamp on Joost Plattel

item.title: Startup Weekend Utrecht
item.description: Last weekend I participated in Startup Weekend Utrecht. At almost 100 attendees, we've got the 8th floor of the Nijenoord building pretty stocked. As I predicted, I got an idea during the pitching process. Luckily I was able to pitch it anyhow and after the voting procedure the announcement was made that I made it to the top 13 viable ideas. So now I had to go and create a team!
